Package DroneSimulation.gui

Class HunterDrone

java.lang.Object
DroneSimulation.gui.Object
DroneSimulation.gui.HunterDrone
public class HunterDrone
extends Object
A hunter drone that can be added to the drone arena.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class DroneSimulation.gui.Object

    objectCounter, objectId, radius, speed, x, y

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    HunterDrone()  
    HunterDrone​(double x, double y, double radius, double angle, double speed)
    Create an object of type HunterDrone that holds the co-ordinates of where it is located, the radius of the hunter drone, the angle at which it is moving, and the speed of the hunter drone.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void adjustObject()
    Move the hunter drone in the direction it is facing.
    protected void checkObject​(DroneArena a)
    Check if the hunter drone is colliding into an obstacle, other hunter drones, drones, or walls.
    void drawObject​(MyCanvas mc)
    Draw the hunter drone on the canvas.

  • Constructor Details

    • HunterDrone

      public HunterDrone()

    • HunterDrone

      public HunterDrone​(double x, double y, double radius, double angle, double speed)
      Create an object of type HunterDrone that holds the co-ordinates of where it is located, the radius of the hunter drone, the angle at which it is moving, and the speed of the hunter drone.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate of the hunter drone.
      y - The y co-ordinate of the hunter drone.
      radius - The radius of the hunter drone.
      angle - The angle at which the hunter drone is moving.
      speed - The speed at which the hunter drone is moving.

  • Method Details

    • drawObject

      public void drawObject​(MyCanvas mc)
      Draw the hunter drone on the canvas.
      Overrides:
      drawObject in class Object
      Parameters:
      mc - The canvas on which the hunter drone is to be drawn.

    • checkObject

      protected void checkObject​(DroneArena a)
      Check if the hunter drone is colliding into an obstacle, other hunter drones, drones, or walls. If the hunter drone goes out of bounds, remove the drone from the drone arena and add another hunter drone.
      Overrides:
      checkObject in class Object
      Parameters:
      a - The drone arena in which the drone resides.

    • adjustObject

      protected void adjustObject()
      Move the hunter drone in the direction it is facing.
      Overrides:
      adjustObject in class Object

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String stating the co-ordinates at which the hunter drone is located, and in which direction it is moving.

    • saveString

      public java.lang.String saveString()
      Overrides:
      saveString in class Object
      Returns:
      String containing information about the hunter drone. Intended to be used when saving a drone arena.
